column2:
"♪（歌っているが、歌自体がどうなるか）
（アカペラ的な感じ。できるんかな？）"
"How to explain this? It's uh... not what you're thinking!"
"Hadred! What is a traitor like you doing here?"
"Are you trying to make me be in your debt, or make amends for your betrayal?"
"It's too late! It's already too late!"
"Why did you betray us? Why did you betray me?"
